name: Chop Chop - A Kitchen Experience
description:
I hope you enjoy playing Chop Chop. If you'd like to provide any feedback or report any bugs please use you following links.

Downloads are provided for both Android (Meta Quest) and PC. The game is developed and tested using the Meta Quest 2 but will run on PCVR headsets. 

Feedback Form:  Feedback Form

Bug Report: Bug Report

If you'd like to follow the development of Chop Chop or check out any of my other works please follow the link to my portfolio: Portfolio
